title: Where Next?: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 24, 2025

title: Japan’s major asset managers mull crypto investment offerings ahead of major rule changes: report
contentSnippet: Major Japanese wealth managers are preparing to launch crypto investment trusts ahead of regulatory changes that would offer tax relief and new rules.

title: Global crypto ETPs see $1.9 billion in weekly outflows, adding to third-worst run since 2018: CoinShares
contentSnippet: The four-week negative streak now totals $4.9 billion — the third largest since 2018, Head of Research James Butterfill said.

title: Revolut Hits $75B Valuation in Fundraise Backed by Coatue, NVIDIA, Fidelity
contentSnippet: Revolut is growing its crypto offerings, including a recent partnership with Polygon Labs and a MiCA license to offer crypto services across Europe.

title: Solana Holders Under Pressure as Sell-Off Deepens
contentSnippet: With 80% of SOL holders underwater and $239M in longs at risk, analysts warn of panic selling but see long-term value in ETF inflows.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Fear Dominates as Altcoins Lag, Bitcoin Tests Key Levels
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s struggle to reclaim the $90,000 range leaves the broader crypto market vulnerable, with altcoins suffering sharp liquidity-driven underperformance.

title: Bitcoin Longs on Bitfinex Jump 40% in Three Months as Traders Double Down on Dip
contentSnippet: Rising margin bitcoin longs show confidence despite bitcoins ongoing correction.

title: ECB Doubles Down on Warning That Stablecoins Could Pose Global Financial Risks
contentSnippet: The EU’s central bank says stablecoins draw value from eurozone banks and could pose a risk to global financial stability.

title: China Returns as Third Largest Bitcoin Mining Hub With a 14% Share: Reuters
contentSnippet: Underground activity expands as cheap power, miner demand and softer policy signals support a renewed mining push in key provinces in China.

title: Thief Posing as Delivery Driver Ties Up Homeowner, Steals $11M in Crypto
contentSnippet: The incident in San Francisco adds to a record year of physical attacks on crypto holders, with cases averaging one a week.

title: Animoca Brands Wins Initial Abu Dhabi Approval to Operate Regulated Fund
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands received in-principle approval from Abu Dhabi’s FSRA to operate as a regulated fund manager within ADGM.

title: Thailand’s Bitkub crypto exchange mulls Hong Kong IPO: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Bitkub's IPO could take place as early as next year, with the company aiming to raise $200 million, Bloomberg reported.

title: Grayscale Dogecoin, XRP Trusts Go Live, Cleanspark Earnings: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Nov. 24.

title: Thai Crypto Exchange Bitkub Weighs Hong Kong IPO: Report
contentSnippet: Thailand-based Bitkub is considering an IPO in Hong Kong to raise approximately $200 million.

title: JPMorgan Chase closes Strike CEO Jack Mallers’ accounts, spurring crypto debanking concerns
contentSnippet: Maller's news prompted scrutiny on whether the alleged Biden-era 'Operation Chokepoint 2.0' is still at large.

title: $80K Bitcoin Put Now Most Popular Bet
contentSnippet: The $80K BTC put is now the most popular options play on Deribit.

title: Department of Government Efficiency Winds Down Despite Months Left To Run: Report
contentSnippet: The administration’s DOGE office has gone dormant months early as the White House weighs easier paths to close federal units.

title: JPMorgan Chase Ends Banking Ties With Strike CEO, Rekindling Crypto Debanking Concerns
contentSnippet: JPMorgan Chase’s move has renewed scrutiny of alleged anti-crypto debanking despite a Trump order banning the practice.

title: Spot bitcoin ETFs shed $1.2 billion in 4th consecutive outflow week
contentSnippet: US spot bitcoin ETFs reported $1.22 billion in net outflows last week, bringing four-week cumulative outflows to $4.34 billion.

title: Bitcoin Logs Longest Losing Streak Since 2024 as Fed Repricing Fuels Cautious Rebound
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's longest weekly slump in over a year puts it on track for its worst quarter since 2018, with a potential bull trap looming.

title: Bitcoin bounces back to $87,500 under ‘fragile’ market structure: analysts
contentSnippet: Market structure remains fragile, and bitcoin is expected to consolidate within a tight range of $85,000 to $90,000, analysts said.

title: Bitwise CIO Says Most DATs Are Headed for Discounts, Not Premiums: Here's Why
contentSnippet: Bitwise's Hougan argues that structural drag in DATs outweighs the few uncertain paths firms have to lift their crypto-per-share.

title: Why This Billionaire Collector Continues to Buy NFTs in 2025
contentSnippet: Businessman Adam Weitsman recently doubled down on NFTs with a record Meebits purchase, and says he’s never sold an NFT—and doesn’t plan to.

title: Offchain Labs challenges Vitalik’s RISC-V proposal, says WASM better for Ethereum L1
contentSnippet: The researchers argue WASM, which has been battle-tested across billions of execution environments, is a better long-term bet than RISC-V.

title: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin Wealth Falls By $41 Billion, Now Poorer Than Bill Gates
contentSnippet: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin-based net worth took a heavy hit as BTC dropped more than 30% from its all-time high set in October.

title: Hoskinson involves FBI after developer’s ‘careless’ experiment splits Cardano blockchain
contentSnippet: An IOG employee resigned after Hoskinson involved the FBI to investigate the incident, concerned that development mistakes could lead to legal consequences.

title: What Is a Layer-1 Blockchain? The Base Layer Powering Bitcoin and Crypto
contentSnippet: Layer-1 blockchains are the base networks that secure and record every crypto transaction, powering Bitcoin, Ethereum, and beyond.

title: Wormhole Labs unveils ‘Sunrise’ gateway to bring MON and other assets to Solana
contentSnippet: Sunrise is a liquidity gateway designed to be the "canonical route" for bringing external assets, like Monad's MON token, to Solana.

title: More Ready Than Bitcoin? How Zcash Developers Are Preparing for the Quantum Threat
contentSnippet: Quantum computers could threaten much more than just Bitcoin, but developers behind the surging Zcash say they aren't panicking. Here's why.

title: Crypto ATM operator considers $100 million sale, days after founder’s $10 million money laundering charge
contentSnippet: The company had previously pivoted to software offerings in the face of "rising fraud exposure, regulatory pressure, and compliance demands."

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.
